scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('node:fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.cjs.json && node -e "const fs = require('node:fs'); fs.renameSync('dist/index.js', 'dist/index.cjs');" && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
